announce-clicklistenactive: Click and Listen was turned on.
announce-clicklisteninactive: Click and Listen was turned off.
chunkcontinue: Click the "Continue" button to continue reading.
chunkwait: Please wait. The reading will continue shortly.
dictionarymessage: Please note: The Dictionary tool uses different dictionary databases. No digital dictionary tool is perfect and the tool cannot take into account the context in which the word you are looking up appears. The Dictionary tool is provided as a service to users of this website, and is provided "as is". No warranty of any kind, either expressed or implied, is given as to the accuracy, reliability, or correctness.
formreader-frinfo: Form reading allows having online forms read aloud to you, including the text you enter or the option you choose.
info-hlicon: Controls whether a pop-up menu should be displayed when text is selected.
info-hloptions: Controls the behaviour of synchronised highlighting.
info-hlscroll: Toggles automatic scrolling. When switched on, the page will automatically scroll to follow the highlighted text.
info-hlsent: Choose a colour for highlighting sentences or choose to underline them or not highlight them at all (None).
info-hltext: Sets the text colour of the highlighted text.
info-hltoggle: Toggles synchronised highlighting. When switched on, the text is highlighted as it is read out loud.
info-hlword: Choose a colour for highlighting words or choose to underline them or not highlight them at all (None).
info-langvoice: Choose the voice that will read text aloud when you click the Listen button.
info-popupclose: Controls whether the pop-up menu for selected text should close automatically, and if so, after how many seconds.
info-restore: Restores all settings to their default values.
info-shortcuts: Set "Enable keyboard shortcuts" to "Yes" if you want to be able to activate features in webReader using keyboard shortcuts.
info-shortcuts-editing: You can change the shortcuts or key combinations for different actions. To change a shortcut for a specific action, click on the button showing the current shortcut and then define the new key combination by holding the keys down at the same time on your keyboard. The button will now show the new shortcut.
languagenotsupported: This function is not supported for the language
loaderror: An error has occurred, try again
moveplayerwebreader: webReader - use arrow keys to move player
popupclose: Close pop-up menu for selected text
selectionrequired: This action requires that you select text first.
selectionrequireddict: To use the dictionary, you must first select the word you want to look up.
selectionrequiredtrans: To translate text, you must first select the text you want to translate.
shortcuts-input: Assigned key combination for action "$a". Click to change this shortcut.
toubody:
Thank you for using ReadSpeaker webReader.

The audio file you are about to download can be used for personal use only. This means that you are not allowed to distribute this file to anyone else, or use it for any other purpose than to listen to it yourself.
touheading: Terms of use for downloaded audio
translatelimit: The text you want to translate exceeds the limit for translation.
translationmessage: Please note: The text has been translated for your convenience using translation software powered by $p. Reasonable efforts have been made to provide an accurate translation, however, no automated translation is perfect nor is it intended to replace human translators. Translations are provided as a service to users of this website, and are provided "as is." No warranty of any kind, either expressed or implied, is made as to the accuracy, reliability, or correctness. Neither ReadSpeaker nor the website owner is in any way responsible for the translation.
wordnotfound: Could not find the requested word, %s.
